Class Entity

java.lang.Object
game.entities.Entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Item, Obstacle, Platform, Player
public abstract class Entity extends Object implements Collidable
Abstract base class for all game entities. Provides common properties (position, size) and methods (collision detection). All game objects (Player, Items, Obstacles, Platforms) extend this class.

This class implements the Collidable interface to support AABB (Axis-Aligned Bounding Box) collision detection.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public abstract void update(double dt)
      Updates the entity's state based on elapsed time. Must be implemented by subclasses to define specific behavior.
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time in seconds since last update

    • render

      public abstract void render(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders the entity to the graphics context. Must be implemented by subclasses to define visual representation.
      Parameters:
      gc - the graphics context to render on
